About

Marina Glen Holiday Resort is situated in Marina Beach on the South Coast of KwaZulu-Natal. Marina Beach is a small "village" between Southbroom and Sanlameer, roughly 15km from Margate on the R61.

Marina Beach is well-known for their Blue Flag beach status that have been retained for 22 years since the programme's inception in 2001.
